Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - .Net Windows Forms Development
Job Description:
As senior software engineer you will work with the Team Lead to develop an ERP application in .Net 3.5
 Minimal Requirements: 

Have good programming skills in .Net 3.5 with C# and understand and apply the important OO concepts and generics
Experience in developing applications with Windows Forms
Good communication skills (Fluent communication in English , report and documentation writing skills)

 Preferred skills: 
Understanding of advanced concepts such as Linq
